name: Sky Tree
description:
Sky Tree is a 2D Roguelike Platformer influence by games such as Spelunky. You start tossed into the clouds and must make your way from the clouds down through the Sky Tree defeating the enemies along the way. Ideally if finished you would travel down from the clouds into the 'Sky Tree' defeating everything along the way to get to the bottom.

Sky Tree has is now at a more finished/playable point, However the game is mostly just a prototype used to get familiar with Unreal so it's not much.

Basic Controls
Movement is WASD

Jump is Space

Left Click fires a projectile attack
